Sentencas: A highly dense electrolyte with lower grain boundary resistance is desirable for improving the performance of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Synergistic effect of lithium and calcium for low temperature densification and grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: This paper studies the synergistic role of calcium and lithium on the densification and ionic conductivity of samarium doped ceria (SDC) electrolyte.
Titulo: Synergistic effect of lithium and calcium for low temperature densification and grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Nanosized powders of compositions, CaxLiySm0.2Ce0.78O2-delta (CLSDC, x + y = 0.02) were prepared by citrate - nitrate combustion method and subsequently sintered at 900 degrees C. A single phase cubic fluorite structure of CeO2 was observed in X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Synergistic effect of lithium and calcium for low temperature densification and grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The segregation of the co-dopants was identified from Raman spectroscopic analysis and FESEM-EDX analysis.
Titulo: Synergistic effect of lithium and calcium for low temperature densification and grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The presence of lithium enhanced the densification at 900 degrees C while calcium improved the grain boundary scavenging.
Titulo: Synergistic effect of lithium and calcium for low temperature densification and grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The synergistic effect of an increase in configurational entropy and density in 0.5 mol% Ca and 1.5 mol% Li (0.5CLSDC900) resulted in the highest conductivity of 5.3 x 10(-3) S/cm at 800 degrees C with a scavenging factor of 20.2.
Titulo: Synergistic effect of lithium and calcium for low temperature densification and grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Thus the optimum ratio of Li+ and Ca2+ plays a key role in suppressing the ordering of oxygen vacancy and improve the ionic conductivity for its use as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synergistic effect of lithium and calcium for low temperature densification and grain boundary scavenging in samarium doped ceria electrolyte
